doc.title: Our School
doc.plot: "Our School" is a verite documentary which follows the lives of three Roma ("Gypsy") schoolchildren - Alin, Beniamin and Dana - as they each try to find their way in a hostile Romanian school in the town of Targu Lapus, Romania. It follows them over two years through one of the first integration experiments in Europe, conducted in a deeply segregated a small Transylvanian town. Roma children find new pride in coming to school with Romanians, even as teachers try to push them back to the old Roma school.
